name: Block Adventure (tfwa.games)
description:
Control : 

Move - Arrow Keys

Jump - Space

Story :

Long time ago.. Block village was a peaceful village..

but now, the block village are very messed up..

when the evil block kidnap the tribal chief of block village and bewitch the villager into a jelly and fly block..

but one of the block villager is not in the village..

he's on the way to back to the village..

when he arrived in the village, he found a note..

the note said "you can breack the spell what bewitch the villager with save the tribal chief of this village.."

Now.. help the blue block to safe the tribal chief with an adventure..
